entry.title: 博客系统可能更换
entry.content:
本文具有时效性，过期会取消置顶，取消置顶后本博客链接就固定，大家可以放心交换友链~

前言

由于某些原因，比如原博客确实太卡，特效多审美疲劳（就算关掉也卡，也可能是电脑太渣了吧哈哈哈），博客过段时间可能会换到本站博客系统，其实这个博客也是改的很费时间了嘞，到时候改动会到各位友链评论下告知更换链接的呐~

Due to some reasons, such as the original blog is too card, special effects more than fatigue (even when turned off the card, may also be a computer too slag ha ha ha), the blog over time may change to the blog system, but this blog are w change takes time, time will change to your comments to inform friends chain replacement links ~

结语

这次是结束也是开始吧，原博客的数据我会好好封存在我的网盘里（宝塔天天都在自动备份到我网盘里，倒不担心数据再丢失），我本来就是要一直把我的博客架设下去，这仅仅只是一段小插曲，也不需要依赖服务器，还挺好，省了一笔钱。

当然，我不再只写中文博文，有时候也会学习写英文博文（可不是机翻噢，真的是自己想的语法查的单词一个一个打出来的噢~），来日方长。

Is over and start this time, the original blog data I’ll seal in my network location (pagoda in the automatic backup network location to me everyday, don’t worry about data loss) again, I always keep my blog was set up, this is just a small episode, also do not need to rely on the server, also quite good, save a sum of money.

Of course, I no longer only write Chinese blog posts, sometimes also learn to write English blog posts (not machine translation OH, really want to look up the grammar of words one by one OH ~), the future is long.

entry.title: 今日份短诗 (2022.09.04)
entry.content:
今日份短诗

  • 别让现实卷走希望
  • 每个人都会遇到不可逃避的成长
  • 也会经历现实夺走天真
  • 但是他奈何不了你
  • 只会让你更加强大
  • 许多人所谓的成熟
  • 不过是被习惯磨去了棱角
  • 变的世故而实际 那不是成熟
  • 而是精神的早衰和个性的夭亡
  • 真正的成熟 应当是独特个性的形成
  • 真实自我的发现 精神上的结果与丰收
  • 命运是勇敢者的游戏
  • 苦难是人生的一种财富
  • ​世界以痛吻​我
  • 我将报之以歌
  • 加油行路人​
  • Don’t let reality drown out hope
  • Growth is inevitable for everyone
  • And experience reality taking away innocence
  • But he can’t touch you
  • It only makes you stronger
  • What many people call maturity
  • But habit has taken the edge off
  • Becoming sophisticated when actually that’s not growing up
  • but premature decay of spirit and premature death of character
  • True maturity should be the formation of a unique personality
  • The discovery of the true self Spiritual results and harvest
  • Destiny is a game for the brave
  • Suffering is a kind of wealth in life
  • The world kissed me with pain
  • I’ll reply with a song
  • Go for it

结语

每个人都会遇到不可逃避的成长，也会经历现实夺走纯真，但是它只会让你变得更加强大！加油！

夜已深了，晚安，行路人

Good night, Tomorrow will be better, It will be.

entry.title: Let's live each day that belongs to us
entry.content:
English

Life is a rhythm

There must be light and shadow

Left is right

Have a sunny with snow

Taste is contained in this fierce and constant twists and turns

And the world we live in

It’s more like a cycle

In the time when it’s not being noticed

In the change of seasons

In the stars where the sun rises and the moon sets

If every corner of the earth were filled with light

Who needs stars

Who would look away at night

Looking for distant security

When tomorrow is today

Today is yesterday

And finally become a day that no longer matters in my memory

Don’t talk about how things have changed

Time always learns not to wait

There is only now to cherish

Chinese

生活是种律动

须有光有影

有左有右

有晴有雪

滋味就含在这猛而不变的曲折里

而我们生活的世界

更像是一种轮回

在不被注意的时间里

在四季的变化中

也在这日升月落的繁星里

如果大地的每个角落都充满了光明

谁还需要星星

谁还会在夜里遥望

寻找遥远的安稳

当明天变成今天

今天成为昨天

最后成为记忆里不再重要的一天

不要再谈事过境迁

时间它始终学不会等待

能珍惜的只有现在​

End

Let’s call it a day and wish you a better day tomorrow

Good night
